title: Valentine's Day with the Guy Next Door
description: A sweet and steamy guy next door curvy holiday romance with apologies to William Shakespeare. JuliaI want to believe in true love and romance.But working in a flower shop on Valentine’s Day is killing it for me. And I’m not expecting to find my gorgeous real-life Romeo right next door.Our families are at war, so the course of love isn’t going to run smooth. Can my neighbor and I have a HEA or are we destined for tragedy?RomanI wasn’t prepared for my red hot neighbor Julia.She’s curvy, beautiful and shines brighter than the sun.I can’t get her out of my head - and I don’t want toBut her cousin is looking for a fight and her family hate the sight of me.When everything goes up in flames will we crash and burn or make it work?Short, steamy and sweet stories are my favorite to write. So I've take the classic Romeo and Juliet story and set it in Snowflake Falls - the most romantic place on earth! No cliffhangers, steamy sex and a sweet story - perfect for Valentine's!
author: Jessa Joy
